summary: The document is a declassified message associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It outlines an individual's diplomatic career starting in 1931, their opposition to Castro's government, and their activities with an anti-Castro group in Buenos Aires as a Cuban exile. The message also notes the availability of further information upon request and mentions the utilization of a business cover.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It details an individual's diplomatic career and their opposition to Castro's government.
Mentions the individual's arrival in Buenos Aires as a Cuban exile and involvement with an anti-Castro group.
References the use of a business cover and the hiring of someone named Karta FSPTNOSA.
